## Schema

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) ISO timestamp when the rule was created.
- `created_by` (String) User ID of the creator.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the validation rule.
- `organization_id` (String) Organization ID that owns this rule.
- `placeholder` (String) Placeholder for the validation rule.
- `rule` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rule))
- `schema_version` (String) Schema version of the validation rule.
- `title` (String) Title of the validation rule.
- `updated_at` (String) ISO timestamp when the rule was last updated.
- `updated_by` (String) User ID of the last updater.

Read-Only:

- `numeric_rule_type` (Attributes) Validation rule for numeric values, supporting range and digit count constraints. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rule--numeric_rule_type))
- `pattern_rule_type` (Attributes) Validation rule that uses a sequence of patterns to validate input. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rule--pattern_rule_type))
- `regex_rule_type` (Attributes) Validation rule that uses a regular expression to validate input. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rule--regex_rule_type))

<a id="nestedatt--rule--pattern_rule_type"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rule.pattern_rule_type`

Read-Only:

- `conditions` (Attributes) Condition definition for a pattern-based validation rule (2 levels deep) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rule--pattern_rule_type--conditions))
- `type` (String) Indicates this is a pattern-based validation rule.

<a id="nestedatt--rule--pattern_rule_type--conditions"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rule.pattern_rule_type.conditions`

Read-Only:

- `one` (Attributes) All conditions must be true (AND logic) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rule--pattern_rule_type--conditions--one))
- `three` (Attributes) NOT condition (negation) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rule--pattern_rule_type--conditions--three))
- `two` (Attributes) Any conditions must be true (OR logic) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rule--pattern_rule_type--conditions--two))

<a id="nestedatt--rule--regex_rule_type"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rule.regex_rule_type`

Read-Only:

- `conditions` (Attributes) Condition definition for a regex-based validation rule (2 levels deep) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rule--regex_rule_type--conditions))
- `type` (String) Indicates this is a regex-based validation rule.

<a id="nestedatt--rule--regex_rule_type--conditions"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rule.regex_rule_type.conditions`

Read-Only:

- `one` (Attributes) All conditions must be true (AND logic) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rule--regex_rule_type--conditions--one))
- `three` (Attributes) NOT condition (negation) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rule--regex_rule_type--conditions--three))
- `two` (Attributes) Any conditions must be true (OR logic) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rule--regex_rule_type--conditions--two))

<a id="nestedatt--rule--regex_rule_type--conditions--one"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rule.regex_rule_type.conditions.one`

Read-Only:

- `all` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rule--regex_rule_type--conditions--one--all))

<a id="nestedatt--rule--regex_rule_type--conditions--one--all"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rule.regex_rule_type.conditions.one.all`

Read-Only:

- `regex_fact_condition` (Attributes) Fact-based condition for regex validation (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rule--regex_rule_type--conditions--one--all--regex_fact_condition))
- `regex_nested_condition` (Attributes) Nested condition with logical operators (level 2 only) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rule--regex_rule_type--conditions--one--all--regex_nested_condition))

<a id="nestedatt--rule--regex_rule_type--conditions--one--all--regex_fact_condition"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rule.regex_rule_type.conditions.one.all.regex_fact_condition`

Read-Only:

- `fact` (String) The name of the value to validate. Should always be 'inputValue' because this property name is passed to the engine
- `operator` (String) The operator to use for comparison
- `params` (Attributes) Additional parameters for the condition (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rule--regex_rule_type--conditions--one--all--regex_fact_condition--params))
- `value` (String) The actual regex

<a id="nestedatt--rule--regex_rule_type--conditions--one--all--regex_fact_condition--params"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rule.regex_rule_type.conditions.one.all.regex_fact_condition.params`

Read-Only:

- `error_message` (String) Custom error message



<a id="nestedatt--rule--regex_rule_type--conditions--one--all--regex_nested_condition"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rule.regex_rule_type.conditions.one.all.regex_nested_condition`

Read-Only:

- `one` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rule--regex_rule_type--conditions--one--all--regex_nested_condition--one))
- `three` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rule--regex_rule_type--conditions--one--all--regex_nested_condition--three))
- `two` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rule--regex_rule_type--conditions--one--all--regex_nested_condition--two))

Read-Only:

- `fact` (String) The name of the value to validate. Should always be 'inputValue' because this property name is passed to the engine
